ch.nolix.system.neuronalNet

Class ForwardMultiLayerNetCreator<IO>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.nolix.system.neuronalNet.ForwardMultiLayerNetCreator<IO>
  • Type Parameters:
    IO - - The type of the inputs and output of the neuronal nets a forward multi layer net creator creates.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    INeuronalNetCreator<IO>

    public final class ForwardMultiLayerNetCreator<IO>
extends java.lang.Object
implements INeuronalNetCreator<IO>
    A forward multi layer net creator can create forward multi layer neuronal nets, that: -Have a specific number of layers. -Have a specific numbers of neurons per layer. -Have the property that each neuron of a layer contains all neurons of the previous layer as input neurons. -Are triggered linearly through its layers.
    Author:
    Silvan Wyss
